latest_version_code.description: The logic version code of the latest release (must prompt update if app version < this)

latest_version_name.description: Display name of the latest version

apk_url.description: Direct download URL for the APK

defaultValue.value: A new version with a beautiful Glassy theme is available!

update_message.description: Message shown to users in the update dialog

force_update.description: Whether to force users to update
